full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA SLOB DPON CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO D'I BAm K'A RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA 'DI, ,CHA HAR DAD LDAN SGRON M YIS, ,DPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I RNAM DKAR GZIS, ,'GRO RGYUD MUN TSOGS MYUR 'JOMS SHOG ,'DI'ANG SHES RAB RAB RGYAS KYIS BRIS,, ,,)
